root.text:
Hey Team,

FYI: <https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C08KM5T319V/p1752243112599489>

We were informed to delay the FTC changes in cancellation funnel for now.
On Monday we will be only implementing changes in the conversion funnel (checkbox on checkout).

with the FTC Rule being blocked, we are

to the cancellation funnel on Monday 14, Jul. This applies to
all brands

Hey Team,

messages.text:
*New update* :update1: :annoucement: 

After aligning with Legal, TPT got approval to delay checkout page changes until *18th August* (reason being a different initiative in the funnel which we are launching this week, so launching FTC can impact the results).

So to confirm from TPT's side:
• Checkout changes will be implemented on the 18th of Aug
• Cancellation funnel changes will be delayed until the further notice

_thread_replies.text:
<@U07VDFEFBQU> <@U027201FQSV> - the checkbox on checkout for GoC is not behind the Feature Flag, correct?

For TPT, given have our own checkout page, we had to work on the checkbox separately. This is why we will need to extract the Conversion funnel changes from the FF.

elements.text:
- the checkbox on checkout for GoC is not behind the Feature Flag, correct?

_thread_replies.text:
Hi <@U03UMPD2NNS>!

The checkbox on the payments page is under a feature flag inside our code base (not Statsig).
• <https://github.com/hellofresh/web/blob/master/app/unified-spaces/checkout-payment/config/config.ts|feature config> (`enableTermsAndConditionsCheckbox`)

Over communicating here, HF and other brands already launched checkbox on 7th July
<https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C04BLF3PYKD/p1752079031629539>

elements.text: LAUNCH
: Opt-in Consent Checkbox & Updated T&C Copy on US Checkout Pages in Funnel - July 7

On July 8th, we implemented the required opt-in checkbox and updated T&C copy with auto-renew language for HelloFresh, Factor, EveryPlate, and GreenChef in the US. This update appears on the Checkout (Payment) page in the funnel. We ran experiments throughout April to determine the best option. From experimentation, we saw a -2.1% decrease in 5wk Net CVR but also a -2.5% decrease in share of customers cancelling, leading to a neutral Morpheus Box count and Net CCV 52wk prediction.
Statsig

attachments.fallback:
[July 9th, 2025 9:37 AM] ana.sollitto: :yellow_alert: LAUNCH*: Opt-in Consent Checkbox & Updated T&C Copy on US Checkout Pages in Funnel - July 7* :yellow_alert:

On July 8th, we implemented the required opt-in checkbox and updated T&C copy with auto-renew language for HelloFresh, Factor, EveryPlate, and GreenChef in the US. This update appears on the Checkout (Payment) page in the funnel. We ran experiments throughout April to determine the best option. From experimentation, we saw a -2.1% decrease in 5wk Net CVR but also a -2.5% decrease in share of customers cancelling, leading to a neutral Morpheus Box count and Net CCV 52wk prediction.

<https://console.statsig.com/VNhnT1dlnFGbNlAloFMfp/experiments/uscro-7143-payment-discl-checkbox-v3/results|Statsig>
